<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105197</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105197</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202653</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Post-EOG Activities: Student Products</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pfosten-EOG Aktivitäten: 
Kursteilnehmer-Produkte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités de Poteau-EOG : Produits 
D'Étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades Do Borne-EOG: Produtos Do 
Estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività Dell'Alberino-EOG: Prodotti 
Dell'Allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετα- Eog δραστηριότητες: Προϊόντα σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades Del Poste-EOG: Productos Del 
Estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this project, students will become entrepreneurs. They will have a business that makes items with 3-Dimensional shapes. They will receive various tasks that will require that they make decisions as any other business owner would have to do.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Projekt werden Kursteilnehmer 
Unternehmer. Sie haben ein Geschäft, das Einzelteile mit Formen
3-Dimensional bildet. Sie empfangen verschiedene Aufgaben, die 
benötigen, daß sie Entscheidungen treffen, da Sonstiges Inhaber 
würde tun müssen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce projet, les étudiants deviendront des 
entrepreneurs. Ils auront des affaires qui font des éléments 
avec les formes 3-Dimensional. Ils recevront divers 
charge qui exigera qu'elles prennent des décisions car 
n'importe quel autre propriétaire d'affaires devrait faire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste projeto, os estudantes transformar-se-ão 
empreendedores. Terão um negócio que faça artigos com formas 
3-Dimensional. Receberão as várias tarefas que requererão que
fazem decisões porque todo o outro proprietário do negócio teria 
que fazer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo progetto, gli allievi diventeranno 
imprenditori. Avranno un commercio che fa gli articoli con le 
figure 3-Dimensional. Riceveranno le varie mansioni che 
richiederanno che prendono le decisioni poichè proprietario di varie 
dovrebbe fare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το πρόγραμμα, οι σπουδαστές θα γίνουν 
επιχειρηματίες. Θα έχουν μια επιχείρηση που κάνει τα 
αντικείμενα με τις 3-διαστατικές μορφές. Θα λάβουν τις 
διάφορες στοιχειώδεις εργασίες που θα απαιτήσουν ότι λαμβάνουν 
τις αποφάσεις όπως οποιοσδήποτε άλλοσδήποτε ιδιοκτήτης 
επιχείρησης θα έπρεπε να κάνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este proyecto, los estudiantes harán 
empresarios. Tendrán un negocio que haga items con las 
dimensiones de una variable 3-Dimensional. Recibirán las varias
tareas que requerirán que tomen decisiones pues cualquier otro 
propietario del negocio tendría que hacer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Negocio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GENEVA WILLIAMS

VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202653</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105197</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
